Description:
It’s an exciting time to be at Infoblox. Named a Top 25 Cyber Security Company by The Software Report and one of Inc. magazine’s Best Workplaces for 2020, Infoblox is the leader in cloud-first networking and security services. Our solutions empower organizations to take full advantage of the cloud to deliver network experiences that are inherently simple, scalable, and reliable for everyone. Infoblox customers are among the largest enterprises in the world and include 70% of the Fortune 500, and our success depends on bright, energetic, talented people who share a passion for building the next generation of networking technologies—and having fun along the way.We are looking for a Senior Information Developer to join our Information Development team in Bangalore, reporting to the manager of Information Development. In this role, you will work closely with cross-functional teams, such as Product Management, Engineering, QA, and Support to develop and deliver technical documentation for Infoblox products. You will analyze, structure, and communicate complex product information in a concise and intuitive manner for the target audiences, such as network administrators. You will also investigate and adopt new technology and tools to improve the creation and delivery of customer-facing documentation for Infoblox products.You are the ideal candidate if you are a great collaborator, have a passion for technology, and are deadline-driven. You possess excellent verbal and written communication skills in English as well as excellent organizational and information architecture skills.What you’ll do:Learn Infoblox products and become the subject matter expert (SME) for creating and delivering technical documentation
Review and analyze technical documents and specifications and communicate with stakeholders and SMEs to gather product information
Work closely with Product Management, Engineering, QA, and Support to drive the creation and production of technical information on installation, administration, CLI, API, online help, and release notes
Make documentation plans and project schedules
Create accurate and concise documentation and structure the information in a logical manner for target audiences so they can access the information in a timely manner
Create illustrations and workflow diagrams to communicate complex information
Use company-supported tools to maintain source files, project schedules, and other relevant information
Manage documentation reviews and integrate review comments
Prepare, produce, and deliver final documentation for posting on the Infoblox documentation portalWhat you’ll bring:8+ years of technical writing experience
Bachelor’s degree in computer science, engineering, or communications
High proficiency in both written and verbal English with exceptional editing skills
Experience with single sourcing and source control systems
Solid skills in Confluence, JIRA, and MapCap Flare
Experience with iPhone, Android, and cloud-based applications and knowledge about DNS, DHCP, and IPAM
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision, a team player mindset, and critical thinking skills
Ability to handle multiple assignments simultaneously in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical, organizational, research, and interview skillsWhat success looks like:After six months, you will…Learn Infoblox products and gain hands-on experience with them
Deliver quality technical documentation on your writing assignments and fix JIRA tickets
Establish good rapport with stakeholders and SMEs in areas that are relevant to your assignments
Be familiar with the InfoDev processes, styles guide, and website contentAfter about a year, you will…Become the technical documentation SME in the Infoblox products assigned to you
Continue to deliver quality technical documentation in a timely manner
Provide process improvement ideas on InfoDev processes and style guide
Keep up with industry trends and tools and give feedback to the InfoDev teamWe’ve got you covered:Our holistic benefits package includes coverage of your health, wealth, and wellness—as well as a great work environment, employee programs, and company culture. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, including a 401k with company match and generous paid time off to help you balance your life. We have a strong culture and live our valuesevery day—we believe in transparency, curiosity, respect, and above all, having fun while delighting our customers. 

Why Infoblox?We’ve created a culture that embraces diversity, equity, and inclusion and rewards innovation, curiosity, and creativity. We achieve remarkable results by working together in a supportive environment that focuses on continuous learning and embraces change. So, whether you’re a software engineer, marketing manager, customer care pro, or product specialist, you belong here, where you will have the opportunity to grow and develop your career. Check out what it’s like to be a Bloxer. We think you’ll be excited to join our team.#LI-AS1Job Details
